snippet.title: Metal Slug Tactics - New trailer | Coming Fall 2024
snippet.description:
**Wishlist Metal Slug Tactics on Steam:** https://store.steampowered.com/app/1590760/Metal_Slug_Tactics/

Metal Slug Tactics will release this fall on PC, PlayStation 4|5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch. 

Discover the latest trailer showcasing Marco, Eri, Fio, and Tarma as they engage in dynamic and strategic combat within the Metal Slug Tactics campaign. 

*Metal Slug Tactics* is a tribute to the iconic series, offering a fresh and imaginative approach. It captures the essence of METAL SLUG’s timeless aesthetic through stunning pixel art and fluid animation.

The excitement of each mission is enhanced by original music from Tee Lopes, acclaimed for his contributions to Sonic Mania, League of Legends, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder’s Revenge, and Streets of Rage 4’s Mr. X Nightmare DLC.”

©SNK CORPORATION ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. ©2024 DOTEMU ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. GAME DEVELOPED BY LEIKIR STUDIO
